application-start-address.help: Address to the beginning of the active application firmware in flash

application-jump-address.help: Jump address for running the active application firmware (if different from application-start-address)

max-application-size.help: Maximum size of the active application

max-copy-retries.help: number of retries for copying candidate image onto the active image area

max-boot-retries.help: number of retries for booting into the active image

show-serial-output.help: Show boot status and progress on serial output. Disable output to save space on headless devices.

use-kvstore-rot.help: use nvstore implementation of the ROT to authenticate firmware headers

startup-delay.help: Startup delay before initializing the storage hardware. (In milliseconds)
